014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer;
015
016import java.sql.SQLException;
017
018import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
019import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.SqlStatement;
020import org.jdbi.v3.meta.Beta;
021
022/**
023 * Customize a {@link SqlStatement} according to the value of an annotated parameter.
024 */
025public interface SqlStatementParameterCustomizer {
026    /**
027     * Applies the customization to the SQL statement using the argument passed to the method.
028     * @param stmt the statement being customized
029     * @param arg the argument passed to the method
030     * @throws SQLException will abort statement creation
031     */
032    void apply(SqlStatement<?> stmt, Object arg) throws SQLException;
033
034    /**
035     * Called after the customizer is instantiated but before any statement is available,
036     * to pre-initialize any configuration data structures.
037     * @param config the configuration registry to warm
038     */
039    @Beta
040    default void warm(ConfigRegistry config) {}
041}
